name: CandyBar iContainer File
summary: Learn about .ICONTAINER files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Collection of Macintosh icons saved in a single file; supports icons up to 512x512 pixels in size; also includes display settings and information about each icon; used for replacing the default icons in Mac OS X.
NOTE: The iContainer format was originally used by The Iconfactory's Pixadex, which is now part of Panic CandyBar.
Sort Pricing Program Name Platform Reset X

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
